articles.title: Broadcom shares rally on new AI deal, CEO's assurance
articles.summary: Broadcom shares jumped 7% in premarket trading on Friday, as an upbeat outlook for artificial intelligence revenue and CEO Hock Tan's pledge to stay on for five more years reassured investors betting on the chipmaker's custom silicon strategy.
articles.translated_title: Broadcom shares rally on new AI deal, CEO's assurance
articles.translated_summary: Broadcom shares jumped 7% in premarket trading on Friday, as an upbeat outlook for artificial intelligence revenue and CEO Hock Tan's pledge to stay on for five more years reassured investors betting on the chipmaker's custom silicon strategy.

articles.title: Donald Trump Inviting Bill Gates to White House Sparks MAGA Fury
articles.summary: The White House event was held to support an initiative on artificial intelligence led by First Lady Melania Trump.
articles.translated_title: Donald Trump Inviting Bill Gates to White House Sparks MAGA Fury
articles.translated_summary: The White House event was held to support an initiative on artificial intelligence led by First Lady Melania Trump.

articles.title: OpenAI To Certify 10 Million Americans In Generative AI By 2030, Partnering With Walmart To Train The Next Wave Of AI-Savvy Workers
articles.summary: OpenAI announced it will offer generative AI certifications as businesses increasingly seek workers with artificial intelligence skills.
articles.translated_title: OpenAI To Certify 10 Million Americans In Generative AI By 2030, Partnering With Walmart To Train The Next Wave Of AI-Savvy Workers
articles.translated_summary: OpenAI announced it will offer generative AI certifications as businesses increasingly seek workers with artificial intelligence skills.

articles.title: OpenAI To Mass-Produce 1st Proprietary AI Chip With Broadcom, Secures $10 Billion Deal: Report
articles.summary: OpenAI is set to begin mass production of its first proprietary artificial intelligence chip next year through a partnership with Broadcom.
articles.translated_title: OpenAI To Mass-Produce 1st Proprietary AI Chip With Broadcom, Secures $10 Billion Deal: Report
articles.translated_summary: OpenAI is set to begin mass production of its first proprietary artificial intelligence chip next year through a partnership with Broadcom.

articles.title: AI Investment Frenzy Leaves Tokyo Electron a Market Laggard
articles.summary: The global artificial intelligence investment frenzy is fast rewriting the fortunes of companies in the semiconductor industry. One notable laggard is Tokyo Electron Ltd.
articles.translated_title: AI Investment Frenzy Leaves Tokyo Electron a Market Laggard
articles.translated_summary: The global artificial intelligence investment frenzy is fast rewriting the fortunes of companies in the semiconductor industry. One notable laggard is Tokyo Electron Ltd.

articles.summary: In London‚Äôs Shoreditch district, long home to UK tech start-ups, a French artificial intelligence firm is crunching data that would have allowed Ukrainian commanders to more quickly counter Russia‚Äôs 2022 full-scale invasion.

articles.title: OpenAI set to start mass production of its own AI chips with Broadcom in 2026, FT reports
articles.summary: OpenAI is set to produce its first artificial intelligence chip next year in partnership with U.S. semiconductor giant Broadcom , the Financial Times reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the partnership.
articles.translated_title: OpenAI set to start mass production of its own AI chips with Broadcom in 2026, FT reports
articles.translated_summary: OpenAI is set to produce its first artificial intelligence chip next year in partnership with U.S. semiconductor giant Broadcom , the Financial Times reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the partnership.

articles.title: OpenAI to launch its first AI chip in 2026 with Broadcom, FT reports

articles.title: OpenAI set to start mass production of its own AI chips with Broadcom, FT reports
articles.summary: OpenAI is set to produce its own artificial intelligence chip for the first time next year, as the ChatGPT maker attempts to address insatiable demand for computing power and reduce its reliance on chip giant Nvidia , the Financial Times reported on Thursday.
articles.translated_title: OpenAI set to start mass production of its own AI chips with Broadcom, FT reports

articles.title: Big tech signs on to White House plan for AI education in US schools
articles.summary: The White House hosted several tech and AI leaders at an event today centered on teaching artificial intelligence in US schools.
